name: The Orb of Health
data: It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The Orb of Health can be signed by one particular owner.
The owner of the orb may create a healing object within the room.
